jei.companion_work_station.relic_fragmen: a relic fragment obtained by smelting a relic fragment
jei.companion_work_station.particle_frag: a particle fragment obtained by smelting a companion relic or particle trail
jei.companion_work_station.companion_ess: an essence obtained by smelting a companion through the companion recycler.
jei.companion_work_station.smelter_block: Vault Companion Recycler to cycle your companion for essence
